reasoning.description: Explanation of the strategy: why these specific tags, lyrics, and parameters were chosen.

style_prompt.description: List of 4-7 genre/style descriptors for the main 'Style of Music' box.

exclude_styles.description: Text for the 'Exclude Styles' box. Comma-separated list of elements to avoid (e.g., 'drums, male vocals, distortion'). Do NOT use 'no' prefix here, just the element name.

lyrics.description: The song lyrics for the 'Lyrics' box, including metatags in brackets [ ].

audio_influence.description: Value between 0 and 1. Optional (only if uploading audio).
